participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, Emily loves to connect with others and share her passions. She's always excited about teaching and enjoys the little moments in life.
participant_1.background: i like to work on vintage cars. i own two vintage mustangs. i like to go to country concerts on weekends. my favorite music is country. i have two dogs.

participant_2.name: Sarah Williams
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, Sarah enjoys learning new things and sharing her knowledge. She's passionate about her family and loves to explore new ideas.
participant_2.background: my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i'm pregnant with my first child. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. i read a book every week.
